txt.en: 'The boar-flank steaks are quite delectable. Hadhelen has outdone himself this time.'
'Glasnír should be proud of this last vintage. It has aged quite well.'
'Ah, such cool and clear water, such as only is found running through the purest springs of Laurelindórenan'
'The light of the lanterns brings hope against the gloom of the coming darkness. Galhíril is an artist.'
'The savoury pie is certainly one of my favourites. It is full-bodied with a meaty taste. Aesbrennil is a marvellous cook.'
'Aesbrennil's berry-pies make a wonderful end to the meal!'
'A toast to the fall of Moria and the rise of Khazad-dûm...may peace come again between the Galadhrim and Durin's Folk!'
'Someday winter will come to Lothlórien, but this is not the day!'
